title: Subarashiki Kono Sekai The Animation
synopsis: One day in the bustling city of Shibuya, a boy named Neku Sakuraba finds himself holding two black pins that enable him to read the minds of people around him. However, these pins also give him the ability to see the "Noise," hostile creatures capable of "erasing" people from existence. After discovering that he is trapped within the confines of the city, Neku receives a message regarding a mission that will nevertheless erase him should he fail.
characters: ['Sakuraba, Neku', 'Kiryu, Yoshiya', 'Misaki, Shiki', 'Bitou, Daisukenojo', 'Raimu', 'Minamimoto, Shou', 'Hanekoma, Sanae', 'Kariya, Kouki', 'Konishi, Mitsuki', 'Higashizawa, Yodai']
